title: Design of Interactive Mathematics MOOCs and Learner Retention Strategies

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic secondary mathematics concepts and practical application experience
context.additional_context: A blended learning environment (asynchronous/synchronous) using digital devices, emphasizing task relevance for current practitioners.

learning_goals: Learners complete collaborative projects to solve mathematical modeling problems within 4 weeks with an 80% or higher participation rate.
Learners achieve an average score of 75% or higher on weekly quizzes (formative assessments) by the end of the course.
Learners participate in community discussions at least twice weekly and submit problem-solving solutions reflecting peer feedback.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
